about_the_game:
Luna Hop: First Chapter "Rooftop Room" Demo Release 🎮

“What would Seoul look like if it turned black and white?”
Luna Hop is a heartfelt 3D adventure game inspired by the picture book Moon Rabbit by Choi Young-Ah.
In this demo, you can experience the first chapter, "Rooftop Room," where the rabbit's journey begins.
Start your adventure from a small rooftop room, searching for scattered moon fragments and bringing back the lost colors of the city.

Demo Highlights ✨

🌌 Coloring Healing Gameplay
Explore black-and-white spaces, find moon fragments, and restore colors while healing your mind and soul.

🌉 Emotional Storytelling
Follow the rabbit's journey from a small rooftop to the wide world, discovering warmth, hope, and courage along the way.

🎨 A Blend of Reality and Fairy Tales
Experience the fusion of realistic urban Seoul and magical storytelling, creating a world full of inspiration.

Download the demo now and take the first step in your journey to find the moon!
Rediscover hope and courage with Luna Hop, as you restore lost colors and embrace a heartfelt adventure. 🌙

Help Shape Luna Hop 🌟

Luna Hop is an unfinished journey.
We need your feedback to make this project even more moving and complete.
Share your thoughts and ideas freely after playing the demo—your voice is the most significant part of this journey.

Together, let's create the journey to find the moon! 🌙

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CORE i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtak
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CORE i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel CORE i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 32 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtak
